      • newTracker

        @Deprecated
public Tracker newTracker(String trackerUrl,
                            int siteId,
                            String authToken)
                   throws MalformedURLException
        Deprecated. Use newTracker(String, int) as there are security concerns over the authToken.
        Parameters:
        trackerUrl - (required) Tracking HTTP API endpoint, for example, http://your-piwik-domain.tld/piwik.php
        siteId - (required) id of site
        authToken - (optional) could be null or valid auth token.
        Returns:
        Tracker object
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • newTracker

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • setOptOut

        public void setOptOut(boolean optOut)
        Use this to disable Piwik, e.g. if the user opted out of tracking. Piwik will persist the choice and remain disable on next instance creation.

        The choice is stored in PREFERENCE_FILE_NAME under the key PREFERENCE_KEY_OPTOUT.
        Parameters:
        optOut - true to disable reporting

      • isOptOut

        public boolean isOptOut()
        Returns:
        true if Piwik is currently disabled

      • isDryRun

        public boolean isDryRun()

      • isDebug

        public boolean isDebug()

      • setDebug

        public void setDebug(boolean debug)

      • setDryRun

        public void setDryRun(boolean dryRun)
        The dryRun flag set to true prevents any data from being sent to Piwik. The dryRun flag should be set whenever you are testing or debugging an implementation and do not want test data to appear in your Piwik reports. To set the dry run flag, use:
        Parameters:
        dryRun - true if you don't want to send any data to piwik

      • getApplicationDomain

        public String getApplicationDomain()

      • getSharedPreferences

        public android.content.SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()
        Returns the shared preferences used by Piwik that are stored under PREFERENCE_FILE_NAME
        Returns:
        Piwik's SharedPreferences instance
